overview: The legends of the Western and Eastern hemispheres merge in this 10th and final chapter of the Nazca anim√© saga. To cleanse the Earth, kendo master Tate -- the reincarnation of the Inca lord Yawaru -- launches a campaign in the present to unleash the destructive force of the Peruvian god Iriyatesse. His opponent, Kyoji, vows to stop Tate from unleashing the all-powerful force that threatens to destroy the planet.
title: Nazca: Eternal Power
